_claim(DirectPaymentsPool.LimitsData sto.details: Claims rewards for the specified NFT ID.

params._data: The NFTData struct containing data about the NFT.
params._nftId: The ID of the NFT to claim rewards for.
params.globalLimits: The global limits data to check against.
params.limits: The safety limits to check against.
params.memberLimits: The mapping of member limits to check against.
params.settings: The pool settings containing the reward token and other configurations.

_enforceAndUpdateGlobalLimits(DirectPaym.details: Updates the global limits with the new reward.

params.globalLimits: The global limits data to update.
params.limits: The safety limits to check against.
params.reward: The amount of rewards to update.

_enforceAndUpdateMemberLimits(DirectPaym.details: Enforces and updates the reward limits for the specified member. if the member is not a valid member, or past limit it returns false and member will not get rewards.

params.limits: The safety limits to check against.
params.member: The address of the member to enforce and update limits for.
params.memberStats: The member's limits data to update.
params.reward: The amount of rewards to enforce and update limits for.

_sendReward(DirectPaymentsPool.LimitsDat.details: Sends rewards to the specified recipients.

params.recipients: The addresses of the recipients to send rewards to.
params.reward: The total amount of rewards to send.
